comment: Ginto AI Chat Configuration - Similar to VS Code settings

streaming.comment: If true, markdown is rendered server-side with Parsedown. If false, raw markdown is sent to client.

rateLimit.comment: Delay in milliseconds between consecutive model requests to avoid rate limiting

agentPlan.comment: Maximum number of tool calls allowed in a single agentic plan execution

visitor.comment: Maximum prompts per hour for non-logged-in visitors

sandbox_exec.comment: Require premium subscription to execute commands

tools.comment: If true, tools execute without confirmation by default
